title: Exhausted from Playing?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Ugh... Ruby is so sore......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Me too... We played too much during Golden Week.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>But it was so fulfilling to do everything!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes! Ayumu-san and the others’ event yesterday was fun as well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>They said there would be a talk session, but the live performance was amazing too! Ruby waved her hands so much and couldn’t help but cheer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yeah, same here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby wants to take it easy during today’s practice......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>If only we could......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Lanzhu will probably say something like, “The event was awesome! Let’s practice even more so that we can level up!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
